hero.title: Next generation digital banking
hero.desc1: Take your financial life online. Your Digitalbank account will be a one-stop-shop for spending and saving,

whyChoose.title: Why choose Digitalbank?
whyChoose.desc1: We leverage Open Banking to turn your bank account into your financial hub.
whyChoose.desc2: Control your finances like never before.

online.title: Online Banking
online.desc: Our modern web and mobile applications allow you to keep track of your finances wherever you are in the world.

budgeting.title: Simple Budgeting
budgeting.desc: See exactly where your money goes each month. Receive notifications when you’re close to hitting your limits.

onboarding.title: Fast Onboarding
onboarding.desc: We don’t do branches. Open your account in minutes online and take control of your finances right away.

api.title: Open API
api.desc: Manage your savings, investments, pension, and much more from one account. Tracking your money has never been easier.
